data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Basse-Kotto, Central African Republic to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Basse-Kotto, Central African Republic
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Basse-Kotto, Central African Republic.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Basse-Kotto to agree with you and with one another.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Basse-Kotto, Central African Republic. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Basse-Kotto, Central African Republic.
Lord, to the people of Basse-Kotto you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Basse-Kotto, Central African Republic.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Basse-Kotto, Central African Republic has a population of 205,800.

We estimate Basse-Kotto has 66,018 people who might know Jesus, 80,933 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 58,849 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Basse-Kotto
location.people_groups_list: Pygmy, Gbanziri, Furu, Kpagua, Pygmy, Bamassa
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Pygmy, Gbanziri (20,000), Furu (5,600), Kpagua (4,900), Pygmy, Bamassa (14,000)
